Password

  • Simple
  • Icon Button
  • Inside Button
  • Outside Button

Simple

Password field has two different states. Try them by clicking on the tabs below:

Default State
Error State
This is an error message. 
<div class="sui-form-field">

	<label
		for="unique-id"
		id="label-unique-id"
		class="sui-label"
	>
		Password label <a href="#" class="sui-label-link">with link</a>
	</label>

	<input
		type="password"
		id="unique-id"
		class="sui-form-control"
		aria-labelledby="label-unique-id"
		aria-describedby="message-unique-id"
	/>

	<span id="message-unique-id" class="sui-error-message" style="display: none;">Error message</span>

</div>
This is an error message. 
<div class="sui-form-field sui-form-field-error">

	<label
		for="unique-id"
		id="label-unique-id"
		class="sui-label"
	>
		Password label <a href="#" class="sui-label-link">with link</a>
	</label>

	<input
		type="password"
		id="unique-id"
		class="sui-form-control"
		aria-labelledby="label-unique-id"
		aria-describedby="message-unique-id"
	/>

	<span id="message-unique-id" class="sui-error-message">Error message</span>

</div>

Icon Button

Password field can have an icon button that will help users to show or hide, depending the case, the password text. Try this by clicking on the icon button placed at right of the field.

Default State
Error State
This is an error message. 
<div class="sui-form-field">

	<label
		for="unique-id"
		id="label-unique-id"
		class="sui-label"
	>
		Password label <a href="#" class="sui-label-link">with link</a>
	</label>

	<div class="sui-with-button sui-with-button-icon">

		<input
			type="password"
			id="unique-id"
			class="sui-form-control"
			aria-labelledby="label-unique-id"
			aria-describedby="message-unique-id"
		/>

		<button class="sui-button-icon">
			<i aria-hidden="true" class="sui-icon-eye"></i>
			<span class="sui-password-text sui-screen-reader-text">Show Password</span>
			<span class="sui-password-text sui-screen-reader-text sui-hidden">Hide Password</span>
		</button>

	</div>

	<span id="message-unique-id" class="sui-error-message" style="display: none;">Error message</span>

</div>
This is an error message. 
<div class="sui-form-field sui-form-field-error">

	<label
		for="unique-id"
		id="label-unique-id"
		class="sui-label"
	>
		Password label <a href="#" class="sui-label-link">with link</a>
	</label>

	<div class="sui-with-button sui-with-button-icon">

		<input
			type="password"
			id="unique-id"
			class="sui-form-control"
			aria-labelledby="label-unique-id"
			aria-describedby="message-unique-id"
		/>

		<button class="sui-button-icon">
			<i aria-hidden="true" class="sui-icon-eye"></i>
			<span class="sui-password-text sui-screen-reader-text">Show Password</span>
			<span class="sui-password-text sui-screen-reader-text sui-hidden">Hide Password</span>
		</button>

	</div>

	<span id="message-unique-id" class="sui-error-message">Error message</span>

</div>

Inside Button

Some password fields come with buttons to show or hide the password text, depending the case, and the button could be placed inside the input element.

Default State
Error State
This is an error message. 
<div class="sui-form-field">

	<label
		for="unique-id"
		id="label-unique-id"
		class="sui-label"
	>
		Password label <a href="#" class="sui-label-link">with link</a>
	</label>

	<div class="sui-with-button sui-with-button-inside">

		<input
			type="password"
			id="unique-id"
			class="sui-form-control"
			aria-labelledby="label-unique-id"
			aria-describedby="message-unique-id"
		/>

		<button class="sui-button">
			<span class="sui-password-text">Show</span>
			<span class="sui-password-text sui-hidden">Hide</span>
		</button>

	</div>

	<span id="message-unique-id" class="sui-error-message" style="display: none;">Error message</span>

</div>
This is an error message. 
<div class="sui-form-field sui-form-field-error">

	<label
		for="unique-id"
		id="label-unique-id"
		class="sui-label"
	>
		Password label <a href="#" class="sui-label-link">with link</a>
	</label>

	<div class="sui-with-button sui-with-button-inside">

		<input
			type="password"
			id="unique-id"
			class="sui-form-control"
			aria-labelledby="label-unique-id"
			aria-describedby="message-unique-id"
		/>

		<button class="sui-button">
			<span class="sui-password-text">Show</span>
			<span class="sui-password-text sui-hidden">Hide</span>
		</button>

	</div>

	<span id="message-unique-id" class="sui-error-message">Error message</span>

</div>

Outside Button

Some password fields come with buttons to show or hide the password text, depending the case, and the button could be placed next to the input element.

Default State
Error State
This is an error message. 
<div class="sui-form-field">

	<label
		for="unique-id"
		id="label-unique-id"
		class="sui-label"
	>
		Password label <a href="#" class="sui-label-link">with link</a>
	</label>

	<div class="sui-with-button sui-with-button-outside">

		<input
			type="password"
			id="unique-id"
			class="sui-form-control"
			aria-labelledby="label-unique-id"
			aria-describedby="message-unique-id"
		/>

		<button class="sui-button sui-button-lg">
			<span class="sui-password-text">Show</span>
			<span class="sui-password-text sui-hidden">Hide</span>
		</button>

	</div>

	<span id="message-unique-id" class="sui-error-message" style="display: none;">Error message</span>

</div>
This is an error message. 
<div class="sui-form-field sui-form-field-error">

	<label
		for="unique-id"
		id="label-unique-id"
		class="sui-label"
	>
		Password label <a href="#" class="sui-label-link">with link</a>
	</label>

	<div class="sui-with-button sui-with-button-outside">

		<input
			type="password"
			id="unique-id"
			class="sui-form-control"
			aria-labelledby="label-unique-id"
			aria-describedby="message-unique-id"
		/>

		<button class="sui-button sui-button-lg">
			<span class="sui-password-text">Show</span>
			<span class="sui-password-text sui-hidden">Hide</span>
		</button>

	</div>

	<span id="message-unique-id" class="sui-error-message">Error message</span>

</div>
